parameter.name: authToken
parameter.label: Auth_Token
parameter.description: This is the Authority Token used to communicate with the Konnected Module.

parameter.name: hostAddress
parameter.label: OpenHAB Address
parameter.description: The host address and port of openhab: example 192.168.1.180:8080. If blank the binding will auto determine the address based on the address and port the server is bound to.

parameter.name: callBackPath
parameter.label: OpenHAB CallBack
parameter.description: The callback path for where the module can send status updates. If left blank the binding will default to /Konnected/{ThingId}

parameter.name: blink
parameter.label: blink
parameter.description: When set to false the Led on the device won't blink during transmission.

parameter.name: discovery
parameter.label: discovery
parameter.description: If set to true the device will not respond to discovery requests via UPnP. Make sure you have statically assigned an IP address to the module before applying this setting. See https://help.konnected.io/support/solutions/articles/32000023968-disabling-device-discovery

parameter.name: controller_softreset
parameter.label: Soft Reset Module
parameter.description: Send A Restart Command to the Module.

parameter.name: controller_removewifi
parameter.label: Factory Reset
parameter.description: Resets the module to Factory Conditions.

parameter.name: controller_sendConfig
parameter.label: Update Settings
parameter.description: Manually sends the settings to the module. The binding will send settings on every restart and if there are any configuration changes but this can be used to manually update the settings as needed.
